long_description: You'll sleep like a baby in the warm and plush Mountain Hardwear Phantom +0 sleeping bag with Q.Shield(TM) DOWN 800-fill goose down. Q.Shield(TM) advance water repellency technology protects individual down fibers from moisture so they retain loft and insulation properties; Q.Shield won't wear off. Insulated with lightweight and compressible Q.Shield 800-fill-power goose down to keep you warm. Performance mummy cut features a snug overall fit that positions the down insulation close to the body, maximizing warmth and minimizing weight without restrictiveness. Nylon shell is lightweight and tear resistant; fabric is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to repel moisture. Tight 5-in. baffle spacing keeps down from shifting and prevents cold spots. Multi-baffled, tailored hood lies close along the sides of neck and face for easy warmth. Ergonomic collar drapes comfortably over neck and shoulders, sealing out drafts; no need to cinch it unless it's close to bag's temperature limits. When it's cold enough to cinch down the hood, the down-insulated face gasket snugs comfortably to hold in warmth. Full-length, 2-way zipper with locking sliders stay in place when bag is partially unzipped for ventilation; insulated draft tube extends to bottom of bag. Mountain Hardwear Phantom +0 sleeping bag comes with a mesh storage sack and stuff sack.
